title: Preparations to Build the Temple
summary: Solomon begins preparations to build the temple. He arranges materials and labor, including skilled craftsmen from Tyre, and gathers thousands of workers from among the Israelites and foreigners.

faq.question: Who did Solomon ask for help?
faq.answer: King Hiram of Tyre, to provide cedar and skilled craftsmen.

faq.question: What was the purpose of the temple?
faq.answer: To honor God and be a place of worship and sacrifice.
